https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ljG6iEJo1f0SmLMTvjdpVfG4XoB.jpg Inspired by Goethe's early romantic play Clavigo, Roland Petit's ballet recounts the agonies of a weak-willed lover torn between the contradictory promptings of his heart and his evil spirit, which urges him to serve his own interests and forsake true love in favor of a life of debauchery. Recorded live at the Opera National de Paris, Palais Garnier, October 1999. Clavigo
